header.title: Referral Program Overview
header.subtitle: Monitor and manage your company's referral program.

myDashboard.title: My Referral Dashboard
myDashboard.description: View your personal referral link, track your invites, and see your earned rewards.

rewardsProgram.title: View Rewards Program
